about_slide.content_1: is an easy-to-use platform ERP (Enterprise Resource Planning) with centralized digital operation dashboard tools. Buvons Local PRO specializes in the distribution, promotion and sales of craft beer and other beverages in Quebec.
about_slide.content_2: is proud to be an important linchpin in the commercial bridge between breweries, retailers and distributors in Quebec.
about_slide.content_3: offers a fundamental harmonious attention to detail, quality of service, security and an undenied trust. With a dedicated team acting as « Liaison agent » between suppliers, distributors and merchants; Buvons Local offers a «Turnkey» sales, purchasing and distribution service management solution in exchange of an All-inclusive flat and personalized flat fee WITHOUT commissions.

team.content_1: Our exceptional team at Buvons Local PRO, is formed by a collective of dynamic individuals who bring together a perfect blend of business acumen, industry savvy, and unwavering passion for what we do. Each team member is driven by a common goal: to revolutionize the beer industry through innovation, collaboration, and a deep love for craft beer.
team.content_2: Our team comprises accomplished individuals with a wealth of experience in diverse industries. Their expertise in strategic planning, innovation and technology, finance, marketing, and operations brings invaluable insights to our company, enabling us to navigate the complexities of the business world with confidence and precision. They possess a proven track record of success, having spearheaded numerous ventures and delivered remarkable results.
team.content_3: Furthermore, our team is intimately familiar with the intricacies of the beer industry. We have individuals who have spent years immersed in the world of brewing, building relationships with breweries, suppliers, and distributors. Their profound understanding of the market dynamics, consumer preferences, and emerging trends empowers us to develop an ERP platform that meets the specific needs of breweries, Merchants and Distributors while anticipating the challenges of the ever-evolving artisanal beer landscape.
team.visionary: The visionary founder of our company ...
team.general_director_p: >General Director at Buvons Local PRO is ...
team.chief_p: Our Chief Technology Officer (CTO) is an ...

team.executive_p: Eve-Marie Gravel – a woman who posses ...

daniel.p1: The visionary founder of our company and a true luminary in the artisanal beer industry in Quebec. With over two decades of hands-on experience, Dan has immersed himself in the art of beer distribution, mastering the delicate balance between tradition and innovation. His expertise extends from the intricacies of method selection and routes techniques to the complexities of low-cost operations profiles and purchase orders management.
daniel.p2: But what truly sets Dan apart is his genuine connection with people. As a natural leader and passionate advocate for the craft beer community, he has fostered deep relationships with brewers, suppliers, retailers, and enthusiasts alike. Dan's infectious enthusiasm and genuine love for his job shine through in every interaction, as he effortlessly communicates his knowledge and shares his unwavering passion for craft beer and technics for operations that maximize productivity and expansion.
daniel.p3: A craft beer lover himself, Dan embodies the spirit of exploration and adventure that defines the industry. From humble beginnings as a local admin assistant for an artisanal brewery to successfully launching and managing his beer distribution company “Distribution Bucké” that has become a reference name in the industry; Dan has traversed the entire beer operations and management landscape, gaining invaluable insights and honing his “Know How” along the way. This firsthand experience, combined with his innate ability to connect with people, has shaped Dan into a respected authority in the artisanal beer realm. His dedication to quality, innovation, and sustainability is reflected in everything we do at Buvons Local PRO.
daniel.p4: Driven by a relentless pursuit of excellence and a desire to push the boundaries of what is possible in the beer industry, Dan embarked on the journey of creating our ground-breaking ERP platform and his unwavering commitment to excellence continues to inspire us every day.

roch.p1: General Director at Buvons Local PRO is armed with over a decade of experience leading IT teams, Roch has transformed his career to become a significant figure in the Quebec brewery and cider industry, helping companies not just reach, but surpass their business objectives expectations.
roch.p2: His experience spans a broad spectrum of roles within this niche industry. He's worked for retailers (buyers) at the management level, a distributor, and a producer where he has dealt with consulting, production management, product development, marketing, business and market development. Further, his role as a project manager for the AMBQ has provided him with a comprehensive understanding of the industry, enabling him to account for the needs of all involved parties in his decision-making at Buvons Local PRO.
roch.p3: After returning to his IT roots and applying his industry knowledge to a B2B platform serving Quebec's Food & Bev industry, Roch found his calling at Buvons Local PRO - an Enterprise Resource Planning platform exclusively crafted for the artisanal beer industry.
roch.p4: Roch is more than just a General Director; he's a relationship builder and a problem solver. He is known for leveraging his expansive network to devise innovative solutions that benefit not only Buvons Local PRO but also the entire industry. He is also at the helm of sales and business development, with the responsibility of driving company growth and fostering long-lasting relationships with our partners and clients.
roch.p5: Roch's dedication to the craft extends beyond his professional commitments. His belief in competition as a mechanism only to challenge large corporations and multinationals rather than the artisans who infuse their passion and hard work into their craft is testament to his love for the industry.
roch.p6: Roch's extensive industry knowledge, his commitment to the success of all players, and his leadership in sales and business development make him the ideal guiding force for Buvons Local PRO. His role at Buvons Local PRO is not simply about the company's success; it is about crafting a brighter future for the entire artisanal beer industry, enabling businesses to compete, grow, and excel. With Roch at the helm, we look forward to a journey of exponential growth and industry-wide transformation.

johenessco.p1: Our Chief Technology Officer (CTO) is an extraordinary force driving innovation and important piece that allowed the development and implementation of Buvons Local PRO.
johenessco.p2: With a strong educational background in communications science and an impressive set of credentials Jay brings a unique combination of expertise in entrepreneurship and technology to our team.  Unquestionably, Jay, is a true people person. He possesses a captivating presence and a natural ability to connect with others, making him a powerful communicator and a skilled relationship builder. His diverse interests span across Fine Art, IT. Fintech, Decentralized Financing, Cryptocurrency, Blockchain and the Metaverse, showcasing his insatiable curiosity for emerging industries and disruptive technologies.
johenessco.p3: What sets Johnessco apart is his extensive experience in bridging the gap between technology and entrepreneurship. Armed with Harvardx diplomas in Entrepreneurship in Emerging Economies and Technology Entrepreneurship Lab to Market, Jay possesses a profound understanding of how to transform innovative ideas into market-ready solutions. His business vision, combined with analytical thinking, technology knowledge and an artistic mind, enables him to structure and implement innovation with precision.
johenessco.p4: In addition to his impressive qualifications and multifaceted professional background, Jay possesses an invaluable network that spans the globe. Through his genuine interest in connecting with individuals from various walks of life, he has forged relationships with Ultra High Net Worth Individuals (UHNWIs) worldwide.
johenessco.p5: Beyond his role as CTO, he wears many professional hats. He is an art collector and dealer, demonstrating his keen eye for creativity and aesthetics. As a business consultant and entrepreneur, he has successfully brought people and businesses together, leveraging his natural gift for problem-solving and seizing business opportunities.
johenessco.p6: Jay's presence in our team amplifies our ability to harness the power of technology and drive our ERP platform to new heights. His leadership, strategic thinking, and innovation-driven mindset ensure that our technology solutions remain at the forefront of the industry, while also creating a seamless experience for our customers.
johenessco.p7: With Jay as our CTO, we are confident in our ability to push boundaries, solve complex challenges, and shape the future of the artisanal beer industry. His expertise, passion, and unwavering dedication make him an invaluable asset to our team, propelling us towards unparalleled success.

raphael.p1: Meet Raphael, a remarkable individual whose keen eye for great opportunities has led him to become a savvy investor in Buvons Local PRO.
raphael.p2: Raphael is a third-generation grocer, with an impressive background in food retailing spanning over 30 years. From an early age, he embraced the belief that customers deserve nothing but the highest quality products. Driven by his insatiable curiosity and desire to explore new horizons, Raphael has always sought out unique and exceptional merchandise that sets him apart from the rest. With over 15 years of experience in the microbrewery industry and ownership of renowned specialty stores such as La Station des bières in Beloeil and La Station des bières et fromagerie in Sainte-Julie, he has cultivated a profound appreciation for fine food, artisanal beer, wine and the pleasures they all brings to life.
raphael.p3: Epicurean at heart, Raphael's love for the delicacies of life knows no bounds. He yearns to share his passion with others, offering them a tantalizing journey through his world of flavors. Whether it's through the art of microbrewing, wine, gourmet food pairings, or other enticing indulgences, Raphael ensures that his customers' senses are ignited and their experiences elevated to new heights.
raphael.p4: Within his business ventures, Raphael's dedication to his craft extends beyond himself. He takes pleasure in imparting his epicurean spirit to his employees, encouraging them to embrace their own love for the finer things in life. Through their knowledgeable guidance and judicious advice, his team becomes a conduit for sharing the joy and satisfaction that can be found in the world of flavors.
raphael.p5: It is worth mentioning that Raphael's foresight as a visionary entrepreneur is truly remarkable. Long before microbrewing gained widespread popularity, he identified the potential in this burgeoning market. By staying one step ahead, Raphael not only secured his success but also played a pivotal role in shaping the industry.
raphael.p6: As a shrewd businessman, Raphael's relentless pursuit of excellence is inspiring. It is this ambition, matched by his unwavering commitment to quality, that has earned him the loyalty and admiration of those fortunate enough to partake in his offerings.
raphael.p7: In summary, Raphael is an extraordinary individual whose good judgment, wisdom as an investor, and entrepreneurial spirit have made him invest and join forces with Buvons Local PRO. With his profound love for the pleasures of life and his unwavering commitment to delivering exceptional experiences, Raphael continues to leave an indelible mark on the industry, creating a legacy that will be savored for years to come.

phileppe.p1: Philippe Wouters, originally from Belgium and now living in Quebec, is a respected beer market specialist. As creator of the journal Bières et Plaisirs, the leading media outlet on the world of beer in the French-speaking world, and as a beer sommelier, lecturer and consultant, he has demonstrated a deep understanding of brewing culture. His commitment to beer and gastronomy extends to his role as a partner in the Buvons Local Pro project, identifying trends and monitoring developments in the beer market. Wouters is appreciated for his enthusiasm and dynamism when leading tasting workshops and conferences, often incorporating a humorous tone and tasty anecdotes. His passion and expertise make him an invaluable resource for those seeking to understand and appreciate the world of beer.
phileppe.p2: Phil, known for his visionary mindset, recently made an asserted decision to join the digital ERP platform Buvons Local PRO as he believes it is a great and much-needed tool in the microbrewery market of Quebec.
phileppe.p3: As an entrepreneur at heart, Phil recognized an untapped opportunity within the Quebec microbrewery industry. He observed that while the demand for artisanal beer is growing worldwide, many breweries and beer-related businesses faced significant challenges in effectively managing their operations and scaling their businesses to meet this demand.
phileppe.p4: Driven by his passion as a Belgian beer-lover himself, and his desire to contribute to its growth and accessibility, Phil sought out innovative solutions that could revolutionize the industry. That's when he stumbled upon Buvons Local PRO, and being impressed by Buvons Local PRO's commitment to supporting local breweries and promoting the unique flavors and traditions of artisanal beer, through his partnership, Phil aspires to contribute to the global recognition and enjoyment of Quebec's microbrewery industry, while also creating opportunities for breweries to flourish in an increasingly digital world that might expend their horizons on the international market as well.

eve-marie.p1: Eve-Marie Gravel – a woman who posses a unique blend of infectious charm, meticulous attention to detail, and a forward-thinking vision. Her innovative approach is set to revolutionize customer support and client retention and development at Buvons Local PRO, driving the company forward in new and exciting ways.
eve-marie.p2: As a vibrant, imaginative, and driven individual, delights in the world of flavors. Over the past 15 years, she's fully immersed herself in the vibrant culture of microbrewery beers, relishing in the diverse, intricate aromas that this universe has to offer. This passion has culminated in co-founding a specialty beer convenience store in Alma and founding KWE Cocktails in 2017, a purveyor of cocktail syrups and boreal-flavored beverages.
eve-marie.p3: Her tenure as Sales and Communications Manager at KWE spanned five years, as well as her position of Sales Manager at Riverbend Microbrewery, allowed her to establish a strong network within the micro-industry sphere. But her love for tasting does not stop at beer. Her natural curiosity led her to explore the realms of wine and spirits, further enhancing her mixology prowess and deepening her understanding of related products.
eve-marie.p4: Moreover, her years living in Quebec City have imbued her with an impressive array of ideas and projects for the region. Her experience in the historic capital ignited a passion for event creation and an overwhelming desire to energize and engage her community. This motivation has fueled endeavors like beer-tasting evenings and more.
eve-marie.p5: With her return to the region, Eve-Marie is bringing her trove of ideas, her innate ability to inspire others, and her impressive network of industry contacts to Buvons Local PRO. As our new Executive Assistant, we are excited to see her blend her innovative vision and customer-centric approach to contribute significantly to our business growth. Get ready for a customer service experience like never before, and expect an evolution of client retention and development at Buvons Local PRO as Eve-Marie's influence unfolds.

general.q1_A: Buvons Local PRO is an easy-to-use B2B2C ERP platform designed specifically for the Quebec craft beverage industry.
general.q1_A1: It offers a centralized digital dashboard with various tools to improve your company's operating processes.
general.q2: What kind of support and training does Buvons Local PRO offer?
general.q2_A: Buvons Local PRO offers full support and training to ensure a smooth integration experience. We will personally assist our customers and, if necessary, provide tutorials and access to our support team to answer any questions or concerns you may have at any time. In addition, we'll have a team in the field, traveling wherever possible to train any retailers, producers or distributors who need it.
general.q3: How safe is Buvons Local PRO?
general.q3_A: Safety is a top priority at Buvons Local PRO. We use standard security measures to protect your data, including encryption, access controls and weekly system updates. Your business information is treated with the utmost confidentiality. Your data belongs to you, and you always have access to it!
general.q4: How do I get started with Buvons Local PRO?
general.q4_A: To get started with Buvons Local PRO, simply contact our team using the contact details provided on our website, or fill out the CONTACT US form. We'll be happy to guide you through the integration process and help you harness the full potential of our ERP platform for the benefit of your business.
general.q5: Is there a monthly fee for Buvons Local PRO?
general.q5_A: For retailers and consumers, the service is always FREE.
general.q5_A1: For suppliers and distributors, YES, Buvons Local PRO has a monthly usage fee associated with the platform. These fees cover the cost of accessing and using the ERP features and live support. Specific fees depend on the size and complexity of your company's operations. The monthly fees charged enable Buvons Local PRO to offer the best service available in the industry at the lowest cost.
general.q5_A2: Please CONTACT US, for detailed pricing information and to discuss your options.
general.q6: Is Buvons Local PRO compatible with PC or Mac devices? Are specific browser extensions required?
general.q6_A: Buvons Local PRO is compatible with PC and Mac devices. It is also compatible with major browsers such as Safari, Chrome, Firefox, Brave, Edge.
general.q6_A1: Our app is available and compatible with iOS and Android for limited and specific features for specific users.
general.q7: Can I have more than one account for my company?
general.q7_A: Yes, a company can have different accounts if they like. Keep in mind each account has an specific fee. However, a company can have different users for the same account allowing management to share tasks with a team. Under the same account, more than one user from the same company can easily use the platform. Each will be able to share common aspects while having a unique and personalized profile.
general.q7_A1: An example of a company having two accounts with multiple users could be a Supplier that also distributes its own product.
general.q7_A3: a) Supplier will have one account to manage products and inventory.
general.q7_A4: b) Supplier will have one account to manage shipments and deliveries.
general.q8: How does Buvons Local PRO integrate with existing systems?
general.q8_A: Buvons Local PRO offers integration capabilities that enable seamless integration with various systems such as point-of-sale (POS) systems, e-commerce platforms, accounting software, and more. This ensures a seamless flow of data throughout your company's ecosystem. All users can download reports or invoices in Excel, CSV or PDF format.
general.q9: Is Buvons Local PRO customizable to meet specific business needs?
general.q9_A: Absolutely! Buvons Local PRO is designed to be flexible and customizable, enabling businesses to tailor the platform to their unique requirements. Our team will work closely with you to understand your needs and understand the system to perfection.
general.q10: How much does Buvons Local PRO cost?
general.q10_A: The pricing for Buvons Local PRO depends on the specific requirements of your business. We offer flexible pricing plans tailored to your needs. Our plans start at only $350 CAD per month. Please contact our sales team for detailed pricing information and to discuss the options available to you.
general.q11: How can I get a detailed breakdown of pricing and fees?
general.q11_A: To obtain a detailed breakdown of pricing, monthly usage fees, and payment commission for payment collection services, please contact our sales team. They will provide you with transparent information on the costs associated with using Buvons Local PRO CONTACT US web form or even better, give us a call and share any additional services you may require. Our phone number is: +1 (450) 641-4848

retailer.q1: What are the benefits for retailers offered by Buvons Local PRO?
retailer.q1_A: Retailers can benefit from Buvons Local PRO by connecting with Quebec's leading artisan producers, having the opportunity to discover and buy new products in advance (with participating producers).
retailer.q1_A3: Opportunity to be discovered by the consumer and increase sales by taking orders for delivery or pick-up.
retailer.q1_A4: Retailers, by using Buvons Local PRO and its group of official suppliers, can also simplify the tedious task of dealing with different entities for payments and only deal with one (1) centralized representative for all suppliers.
retailer.q1_A5: Get additional support, tips and consumer care from participating suppliers represented by Buvons Local PRO.

supplier.q1: What advantages does Buvons Local PRO offer producers?
supplier.q1_A: Producers can rely on Buvons Local PRO to:
supplier.q1_A1: Efficiently manage inventory across multiple warehouses (between supplier and distributor(s)),
supplier.q1_A2: Receive and control electronic orders (placed by merchants directly in the Buvons Local PRO virtual boutique catalog),
supplier.q1_A3: Obtain business intelligence with weekly and monthly sales productivity reports.
supplier.q1_A4: Manage promotions for a specific group of retailers and set up a range of business rules,
supplier.q1_A5: Gain insight into their business operations by easily visualizing the retailers who buy their products.
supplier.q1_A6: Gain visibility for their brands and products thanks to this digital B2B platform
supplier.q1_A7: The simple and efficient download of reports for accounting data which is compatible to most popular accounting softwares, will save you many hours of work.
supplier.q2: Can I upgrade or downgrade if my business needs change?
supplier.q2_A: Yes, we understand that businesses evolve and their needs may change over time. Buvons Local PRO offers the possibility of increasing or decreasing your rate plan according to your current situation. Our team will assist you in finding the most suitable plan for your evolving needs or any needed change or spin-off.

distributor.q1: How can Buvons Local PRO help distributors?
distributor.q1_A: Distributors can use Buvons Local PRO to streamline inventory management with interactive multi-warehouse inventory for multiple sites.
distributor.q1_A1: Track and organize shipments and routes.
distributor.q1_A5: Generally, improve the company's overall operational efficiency. What's more, many of the actions can be automated with their producer customers who also use Buvons Local Pro.

consumer.q1: What benefits does Buvons Local PRO offer consumers?
consumer.q1_A: Buvons Local PRO enhances the consumer experience by making it easy to discover products through our online catalog.
consumer.q1_A1: Customers can locate the nearest store to place a takeaway or delivery order from the comfort of their own home, or simply visit the store and be sure that the product they're looking for is available.
consumer.q1_A2: Get information and updates on new products and fun culinary recommendations to accompany and enjoy a beer.

terms.p82: Buvons Local PRO App is available on both iOS and Android. Features of Buvons Local PRO App include: using an interactive map to find Stores selling beer near your location, finding Retailers for delivery, viewing store hours, directions confirming deliveries,  browsing affiliated brands, descriptions and prices, and redirection to their Sites.

terms.p89: ADDITIONAL TERMS | ONLINE ORDERING VIA BUVONSLOCALPRO.CA AND/OR BUVONS LOCAL PRO APP
terms.p90: Buvons Local PRO offers a service via Buvonslocalpro.ca/ Buvons Local PRO App that allows users to reserve products for pick up or delivery, by themselves or by a licenced liquor delivery service on their behalf as agent, in participating Distribution Bucké retail outlets. Users may access The Sites by visiting: Buvonslocalpro.ca or from Buvons Local PRO App available on both iOS and Android. Users of the Sites may browse from a selection of products, choose products to reserve, and then pickup and pay for those products at a participating retail outlet.
terms.p91: The Sites, through a Payment Processor (STRIPE OR CUBE OR ANY OTHER USED FOR THE PLATFORM) collects and authorizes your credit card information making checkout by you at Buvons Local PRO quick and easy. ALTHOUGH USERS OF THE SITES MAY RESERVE PRODUCT THROUGH THE SITES, THE PURCHASE OF ANY PRODUCT WILL BE CONDUCTED AND COMPLETED SOLELY WITHIN A PARTICIPATING RETAIL LOCATION OF BUVONS LOCAL PRO.
terms.p92: In the case of an order picked up for delivery by a licenced liquor delivery service (“ LDS ”), the LDS will purchase the reserved product as your agent and will seek reimbursement directly from the party that placed the order.
terms.p93: The following additional terms apply to your use of The Sites.
terms.p95: In order to use online ordering via The Sites:
terms.p96: INDIVIDUAL USER can place orders for pick-up or delivery as a guest
terms.p98: RETAILERS can create an account directly in the platform
terms.p100: Accounts will save your preferences and allow you to place future orders more quickly. All Retailer will need to request for service approval from each Supplier in order to place orders.
terms.p101: SUPPLIERS need to request account activation through Buvons Local PRO management, who reserves the right of refusal.
terms.p102: DISTRIBUTORS need to request account activation through Buvons Local PRO management,t who reserves the right of refusal.
terms.p103: ALL USERS should never use another’s account without permission. When creating your Account, you must provide accurate and complete information. You are solely responsible for the activity that occurs on your Account, and you must keep your Account password secure.  Although Buvons Local PRO will not be liable for your losses caused by any unauthorized use of your Account, you may be liable for the losses of Buvons Local PRO or others due to such unauthorized use.
terms.p105: Buvons Local PRO strive to provide accurate information about its products, services as well as all product and services offered by related pertinent users which includes any related pricing, but errors may occur. Buvons Local PRO reserves the right to correct any errors in relation to its availability of products, services or regarding pricing and to modify at any time, without prior notice. Buvons Local PRO cannot confirm prices until after you reserve a product and receive your reservation confirmation by email (when and if applicable). Prices quoted are payable in Canadian dollars.
terms.p107: In order to use the Sites’ purchasing orders, pick-up or delivery service, you might require a valid credit card, authorize a debit application or have an commercial private agreement. The cardholder and the Guest or Account holder, must be one and the same person. In order to make a reservation through The Sites, your credit card information will be collected by our third party payment processor
terms.p109: however, the Payment Processor will only complete the sale and process your credit card once you pick up your reserved product at the specific retail location on pick-up day. Your credit card will be charged the advertised price in your reservation confirmation and receipt. The terms of sale for your reserved product are those applicable to all in-store purchases as may be supplemented by these Terms and any terms on the confirmation of your reservation and receipt.
terms.p110: For delivery service, payment will be processed by a licensed store with liquor delivery service (the
terms.p112: Buvons Local PRO cannot, under current regulations, accept payment from the Guest or Account holder for product (or delivery service fees) to be delivered to home consumers, the LDS must purchase the product on your behalf.  The LDS receiving the order will be paid by the Guest or Account Holder once the LDS delivers the product to you.
terms.p113: PICK-UP BY CONSUMERS USING BUVONSLOCALPRO.CA / BUVONS LOCAL PRO APP
terms.p114: Buvons Local PRO will send the consumer an email to confirm a reservation is ready for pickup. All reserved product (s) must be picked up prior to the close of business on the pick-up day. Reserved product that is not picked-up by close of business of the pick-up day will be canceled.
terms.p115: The consumer or Account holder must be the individual to pick-up his or her reservation. The consumer or Account holder must not be intoxicated at time of pick-up (determined at the sole discretion of RETAILER’s staff at the applicable participating Retailer’s location). Consumer or Account holder must present a valid, piece of government issued photo identification. The following are items are accepted at participant Stores as forms of identification: Passport, Driver’s License with photo, Military Issue I.D. with date of birth and photo, Government Issue I.D. with date of birth and photo and Health Card with photo. You will be refused service and your reservation will be cancelled without any liability to Buvons Local PRO if you are NOT OF LEGAL DRINKING AGE OR IF APPEAR INTOXICATED.
terms.p119: program, Buvons Local PRO require that our staff and licenced liquor delivery services ask for ID from anyone who appears to be under legal drinking age. But it’s not just minors that we are watching out for – Retailers will refuse services to those who appear to be intoxicated.
terms.p120: Buvons Local PRO is proud to partner and promote DRIVE SOBER PROGRAMS SUCH AS
terms.p121: which encourages drivers to plan ahead, drink responsibly, use designated drivers, take cabs or stay overnight.
terms.p122: DELIVERY SERVICE | CONSUMER TERMS OF RESERVATION
terms.p123: Buvons Local PRO does not itself deliver products to home consumers and does not charge any fees for reservation services rendered to the customer.
terms.p124: By completing a reservation through The Sites, the consumer authorizes Buvons Local PRO to forward the reservation, using our platform or through a third-party technology service provider, to a duly licenced liquor delivery service (“LDS”).
terms.p125: The assigned LDS will contact the consumer to confirm its appointment as the agent of the consumer to purchase and deliver the reserved products on its behalf and the assigned LDS must be the individual who picks-up reserved products. The LDS must not be intoxicated at time of pick-up (determined at the sole discretion of Retailer’s staff) and must provide identification matching the LDS assigned to the reservation and receiving the order from the customer.
terms.p126: The LDS, acting as the agent of the consumer, will purchase the reserved product from Buvons Local PRO SUPPLIERS and charge the consumer for the cost of the product as well as a delivery service fee in compliance with applicable regulations.  Buvons Local PRO cannot, under current regulations, accept payment from the consumer for product (or delivery service fees) to be delivered to home consumers, the LDS must purchase the product on your behalf.  The LDS receiving the order will be paid by the consumer once the LDS delivers the product to you.
terms.p127: DELIVERY SERVICE | SUPPLIER TERMS OF RESERVATION
terms.p128: Buvons Local PRO does not itself deliver products to retailers and does not charge any fees for reservation services rendered to the retailer.
terms.p129: By completing a purchase order through The Sites, the Retailer authorizes Buvons Local PRO to forward the purchase order, using our platform or through a third-party technology service provider, to a duly licenced Supplier.
terms.p130: ONLY AFTER CONFIRMATION AND APPROVAL FROM SUPPLIER, Distributor will execute the order and after delivery is completed, Buvons Local PRO will request Retailer for payment on behalf of Supplier (when and if applicable).
terms.p132: Distribution Bucké or its affiliates , take NO liability for any product defect, quality or recall that might occur for which liability rest only and exclusively with the respective Supplier.
terms.p134: The privacy and security of your personal information is important to Buvons Local PRO. Secure Sockets Layer
terms.p136: technology is used to protect the security of your credit card information as it is transmitted and processed.  SSL is the industry standard for secure commerce transactions. It prevents your personal information from being read by someone else as it travels across the Internet. All of your personal information is encrypted, including credit card number, name and address. Nevertheless, there are certain risks associated with using the Internet.
terms.p137: To learn more about how Buvons Local PRO manage personal information, please read our
terms.p140: Buvons Local PRO appreciate your interest in our Sites, products, and services, and for reading these Terms. If you have any questions about these Terms or concerns regarding all services described hereunder, please
terms.p142: Buvons Local PRO reserves the right to amend, change and supplement these Terms of Service by posting modifications and revised versions to the Buvons Local PRO website or App without previous notice. Should you be in any disagreement of any of the above-mentioned Terms and Conditions or eventually you will not accept any added modifications, you must cease using the Services IMMEDIATELY.

privacy.p1: Buvons Local PRO is committed to preserving and safeguarding your right to privacy. This Privacy Policy (“Policy”) explains how BUVONS LOCALPRO collects, uses and discloses the personal information BUVONS LOCAL PRO receives when you visit Buvonslocalpro.ca and/or Buvons Local PRO mobile application (App) (collectively the “Sites”) and use the services provided on the Sites. Personal information refers to information that specifically identifies you. It may include, for example, your name, address, phone number, age and email address.
privacy.p3: Cookies are simple text files that web browsers place on a user's hard drive when our Sites are visited. Cookies tell us that you are a past user of the Sites. Cookies cannot damage files, nor can they read information from a user's hard drive. BUVONS LOCAL PRO uses cookies to measure the number of visits, average time spent, page views, help us recognize you, personalize features, remember your previous orders and to gather other statistics relating to the use of our Sites. You may decline Cookies if your web browser permits, but certain features on the Site may not function if you do not accept Cookies.
privacy.p5: BUVONS LOCAL PRO  collects personal information when your visit our Sites, our retail locations, or communicate with us.
privacy.p6: Customer Service. BUVONS LOCAL PRO collects personal information from you if you contact BUVONS LOCAL PRO  with a consumer complaint or request. The information collected may include your name, address, telephone number, email address, and the facts regarding the complaint or request. We use this information to respond to your complaint or request, to track trends and issues, and to improve our products and services. We may also contact you for future news and events, promotions; unless you opt-out.
privacy.p7: Marketing Research. BUVONS LOCAL PRO  collects information about you if you consent to participate in any of Buvons Local PRO marketing research programs. The information collected may include your name, address, telephone number, email address, date of birth, gender, income, promotional awareness, interests, and facts regarding your consumer habits and preferences. We may use this information to track trends and issues, and to improve our products and services. We may also contact you for future news and events, unless you opt-out.
privacy.p8: Promotions. BUVONS LOCAL PRO collects information about you if you participate in any of Buvons Local PRO promotion. The information collected may include your name, address, telephone number, email address, date of birth, gender, income, promotional awareness, interests, and facts regarding your consumer habits and preferences. We use this information to administer the contest or promotion, to analyze the success of our promotions and to develop new promotions. We may also contact you for future news and events, unless you opt-out.
privacy.p9: Online ordering via Buvonslocalpro.ca/ Buvons Local PRO App. BUVONS LOCAL PRO collects information when you reserve orders through the Sites. The information collected may include your user name, password, reservation history, credit card, and other information relating to your usage of the Sites. We use this information to provide you with the ordering, pickup and delivery services, to track trends and issues, and to improve our products and services. We may also contact you for future news and events, unless you opt-out.
privacy.p10: Retailer Partners in-Store Transactions. BUVONS LOCAL PRO DO NOT collects information in order to process your transaction in-store. Only Retailers are responsible for the information collected; it may include your name, credit or other payment card information, whether you are of the legal drinking age, your order history and other information relating to your use of Buvons Local PRO services. Buvons Local PRO is not responsible for any information use and collected by our affiliated Retailers.
privacy.p11: As a User, it is your choice to provide and share your personal information with us. When you request services from us, we ask that you provide sufficient information to enable us to respond to your request. The personal information may be used to:
privacy.p17: Locate the nearest Retailer or Product from you
privacy.p18: Process your order reservations to be picked-up
privacy.p19: Authorize charges and manage billings related to our services
privacy.p20: Improve BUVONS LOCAL PRO offerings and marketing, to enhance the consumer experience and to assess strategic initiatives
privacy.p23: Respond to your consumer complaint or request
privacy.p24: Respond to job applications and manage our online boutique catalogue
privacy.p25: Comply with regulatory and audit purposes
privacy.p26: Identify other purposes in order for BUVONS LOCAL PRO to provide its services
privacy.p27: Personal information may also be used for other purposes the company might deem necessary.
privacy.p29: By using our Sites or our services, participating in market research or entering a promotion, you consent to the collection, use and disclosure of your personal information in accordance with this Policy and applicable laws.
privacy.p31: If you decide you no longer want to receive emails from BUVONS LOCAL PRO  you can unsubscribe with every offering by clicking on the “unsubscribe” link within our email. You may also contact us at Buvons Local PRO at 102-1405 rue Graham-Bell, Boucherville, Qc. H4B 6A1, Canada. Or by e-mail at support @ buvonslocalpro.ca
privacy.p32: The Sites and the provided services are not for individuals who are not of legal drinking age (18 and over in the province of Quebec, Canada). BUVONS LOCAL PRO  does not knowingly collect personal information from minors. If are under the legal drinking age and believe BUVONS LOCAL PRO  has collected your personal information, or, if you are a parent or legal guardian and believe BUVONS LOCAL PRO  has collected personal information of a minor, please contact BUVONS LOCAL PRO  at support @ buvonslocalpro.ca
privacy.p33: Third Parties and Sharing Personal Information
privacy.p34: In providing our services, we may work with third party service providers, or need to disclose the personal information we collect to other service providers, agents or other third parties who perform various functions for us, such as processing or delivering orders, processing payments, managing promotions and online activities on our behalf.  Such third parties are contractually required to keep all personal information private, confidential and secure at the same or higher security standards demonstrated by BUVONS LOCAL PRO . Third parties may only use your personal information to assist BUVONS LOCAL PRO and for no other purpose. In certain circumstances, we may provide personal information to third parties for legal or regulatory purposes or as otherwise required or permitted by law.
privacy.p36: The Sites may contain links to other non-BUVONS LOCAL PRO  websites. BUVONS LOCAL PRO  is not responsible for the privacy practices or content of such other websites. We encourage you to read the privacy policies of all websites you visit.
privacy.p37: BUVONS LOCAL PRO  Website and Mobile App
privacy.p38: Depending on certain locations, BUVONS LOCAL PRO  may offer the App to our customer for use. For more information on the BUVONS LOCAL PRO  App for iPhone or Android, please visit your device’s mobile app store.
privacy.p39: By visiting your device’s mobile app store and downloading, installing, accessing or using the App, you (the “User”) consent to the collection of your data and all actions that BUVONS LOCAL PRO  take with respect to your data consistent with this Policy and the Terms and Conditions of BUVONS LOCAL PRO  which can be found at the following URL:
privacy.p41: The use of the App entails personal information collection in accordance with the section titled
privacy.p43: of the Policy. This personal information collection may include user controls for App functionality, such as geolocation services, purchasing BUVONS LOCAL PRO  products, and setting push notifications and in-app message preferences.
privacy.p45: Through the use of an iOS, Android or other supported hardware device, some functionality of the App may require the transmission of certain information provided by the User, which includes:
privacy.p50: Financial information, such as payment card or account numbers
privacy.p52: This User Information may be needed in order to purchase BUVONS LOCAL PRO  products and/or services through the App. When using the App, you have the option to securely and conveniently make a purchase by using the App to pay for your purchase by using the payment card registered to your username and account on the App.
privacy.p53: In addition, you acknowledge and consent to other information that may be shared with BUVONS LOCAL PRO  through the App which may include
privacy.p54: analytical information such as location data, diagnostic and usage data and User interactions; and
privacy.p55: geolocation information through technologies such as GPS, Bluetooth, Wi-Fi, or other location-based technology to enhance the user experience so that you may order ahead, receive directions, and see what products are available for sale at nearby BUVONS LOCAL PRO  retail store locations.
privacy.p57: In order for the User to use certain services and App functionality, such as payment via credit card, and use of location-based services and technology, you must either
privacy.p58: enable “Location Services” in the App when prompted or through the App settings on your device; and/or
privacy.p59: set the permissions in your mobile device to allow communication of this information. Additional information regarding adjusting location services on iOS devices may be found at
privacy.p60: Turn Location Services and GPS on or off on your iPhone, iPad, or iPod touch – Apple Support
privacy.p61: Additional information on managing an Android’s device location settings may be found at
privacy.p62: Manage your Android device’s location settings – Google Account Help.
privacy.p63: If you allow for location sharing on the App, your device may communicate with BUVONS LOCAL PRO  in ways that allow for us to customize your experience in browsing and shopping on the App. User acknowledges that if location sharing is not turned on in the settings of the App, that certain App functionality and some services may not work properly without information of your location being disclosed. If you have turned off location sharing on your device and would like to turn it on, you can re-enable the collection of geolocation information, at any time, by turning on location services on your device and in the App.
privacy.p65: BUVONS LOCAL PRO  understands the importance of protecting your personal information. BUVONS LOCAL PRO  takes reasonable steps to make sure your personal information is protected from unauthorized use, access, alteration, disclosure, loss or destruction. However, you should be aware that the Internet is not perfectly secure. You understand that you are providing such information to BUVONS LOCAL PRO  at your own risk.
privacy.p66: BUVONS LOCAL PRO  retains your personal information for as long as it may be required for the purposes described above, subject to any legal, auditing or account obligations BUVONS LOCAL PRO  is required to meet.
privacy.p68: It is important that your personal information is accurate and complete. Having accurate information about you enables us to give you the best possible service. With some exceptions prescribed by law, you have the right to access, verify or challenge the information we have about you and have it amended if appropriate. You can help us keep personal information up-to-date by keeping us informed of any changes, such as a change of email address. If you would like to review or update the personal information in your customer record or withdraw your consent for the collection, use or disclosure of your personal information, or if you have any inquiries, please contact us at support @ buvonslocalpro .ca.
privacy.p69: When you request that your name be removed from our databases, it may not be possible to completely delete all your personal information due to technical and legal constraints, including stored back-up systems.
privacy.p71: To obtain further information about our policies and procedures or if you have any unresolved inquiries or concerns.

social.p1: Social Corporate Responsibility is a cornerstone of our business.
social.p2: One of the things we actively promote at the Buvons Local PRO is ensuring that strict policies are in place to keep alcohol from being sold to people who are underage or intoxicated.
social.p3: Through our “WE ID 18” program, we require that our affiliated Retailers ask for ID from anyone who appears to be 18 years old or younger. But it’s not just minors that we’re watching out for – we’ll also refuse service to anyone who appears to be intoxicated.
social.p4: The following items are accepted at all Retailer Stores associated with Buvons Local PRO as forms of identification:
social.p7: Military Issue I.D with date of birth and photo
social.p8: Government issue I.D with date of birth and photo (can include, permanent resident card, secure Indian status card, or Canadian citizenship card with photograph)
social.p11: Buvons Local PRO is concern about the environment, which is the reason why we are bringing down the use of paper at the lowest possible.  We implemented a system that allows to save trees, also we avoid the use of unnecessary truck transportation with the implementation of smart delivery and empty pick ups routes.
social.p12: Buvons Local PRO is also implicated in the rehabilitation of the environment with partnerships and donations that allows sustainable programs to continue with the good work.
social.p13: Service & Goods to People with Disabilities.
social.p14: In fulfilling our mission, Buvons Local PRO strives at all times to provide its goods and services in a way that respects the dignity and independence of people with disabilities. We encourage our partners (Retailers and Suppliers) to also commit and  to giving people with disabilities the same opportunity to access goods and services and allowing them to benefit from the same services in the same place and in a similar way as other customers.

payment.p1: Social Corporate Responsibility is a cornerstone of our business.
payment.p2: RETAILERS can pay Buvons Local PRO on behalf of participant Suppliers for product acquisition directly to our delivery agent by cash, cheque, credit card or to process payments directly  by wire transfers at any financial institution.
payment.p3: SUPPLIERS can pay Buvons Local PRO for delivery services by credit card, automatic debit from bank institutions or by wire transfers.
payment.p4: RETAILERS, SUPPLIERS and DISTRIBUTORS paying a membership for the use of Buvons Local PRO digital services, have to pay either by credit card or automatic bank debit the first of each month automatically. If for any reason payment shall be declined, Buvons Local PRO will provide with 48hrs grace period before account suspension.
payment.p5: Consumer placing orders for pick-up or delivery shall pay directly to Retailer.
payment.p8: Present a cheque to the driver once your delivery has been received.
payment.p10: Pre-Authorized Debit for Retailers: Payments will be withdrawn from your account 5 days after delivery.
payment.p11: Pre-Authorized Debit for Suppliers in regards delivered product: Payments will be withdrawn from your account 15 days after delivery.
payment.p12: For most banks, payments need to be done prior to 1pm to be received the same day.
payment.p16: Funds Clear Retailer or Supplier  Account
payment.p25: ONCE PAYMENT HAS BEEN COLLECTED BY BUVONS LOCAL PRO ON BEHALF OF SUPPLIER, SUPPLIER CAN EXPECT PAYMENT MINUS DELIVERY AND BANK FEES WITHIN 5 BUSINESS DAYS.
payment.p27: In the case of multiple purchase orders, to enable proper posting of payments we will issue separate invoices for each purchase order and must receive a separate payment for each invoice. Failure to make separate payments will result in posting errors and may cause the Retailer’s / Supplier’s account to become past due.
payment.p28: Other than Pre-Authorized Debit or Credit Card payments, where Buvons Local PRO is responsible for initiating the payment, if Retailer or Supplier do not send payment on or before the applicable due date, Buvons Local PRO will suspend further service until the payment is received. At the discretion of Buvons Local PRO, multiple past due incidents or incidents of payment not clearing at client’s bank will cause Retailers or Suppliers to lose their good standing with Buvons Local PRO.
payment.p30: Present a certified cheque or apply for a credit application with Buvons Local PRO prior to receive any service. Buvons Local PRO reserves the right to request a retainer in the estimated amount of delivered product equivalent to the first 2 weeks.  Such retainer will be credited towards the second (2nd) invoice cycle.

online.p1: Retailers can now discover products and place purchase orders online. If you have not registered yet, go to create your account now and register.
online.p2: Consumers can discover products and place orders for delivery or pick-up with participant retailers. No creation of account is required; however, personal contact information is necessary.
online.p5: Go to Buvons Local Pro product research tool
online.p7: Place your order for pick-up or delivery
online.p8: Be ready with your official ID to pick-up your product or at the door when there is a delivery.
online.p9: Buvons Local PRO does not take any liability for delays, wrong commands or no showups. For any issue or discrepancy, Consumer should contact Retailer directly and vice versa, for any notification, Retailer should contact Consumer directly.
online.p11: Have your business license number ready.
online.p12: Identify if your store offers delivery or pick-up services.
online.p13: Prior to placing the order, please advise support @ buvonslocalpro.ca if you have a large quantity of empty containers to be picked up.
online.p14: Have the number of empty cases, kegs, cylinders and cans to be picked up with delivery, and a listing of products to be returned with delivery.
online.p15: You may change an order up until the order close time.
online.p16: For purchase orders voicemail or same last minute email orders are NOT accepted. Buvons Local PRO will consider at its own discretion the possibility of ad such order in the next delivery. If not possible, Our team will make sure to follow up at the closest available date that corresponds your delivery route.
online.p18: Retailer may place orders up until the order close time, 1 days prior to delivery by 5:00 p.m.
online.p19: For special delivery or any urgent matter, contact us at support @ buvonslocalpro .ca or by phone at +1 (450) 641-4848
online.p21: Buvons Local PRO offers next day delivery. You may place orders up until the order close time two (2) days before delivery at 11:59 pm. If you wish to modify your delivery schedule you can always reach out our staff at support @ buvonslocalpro .ca
online.p22: The following standards apply to all orders:
online.p23: The order close time here below shown is applicable only if Supplier is doing business for Distribution with Distribution Bucké. Buvons Local PRO have no way to know the schedule for any other Distribution company.
online.p24: Note only for orders placed by e-mail or through the platform
online.p29: Orders may be placed by phone anytime during our hours of operation:
online.p33: Orders can also be placed online at anytime but follow ups will take place the next business day.

inventory.p1: @ Distribution’s Warehouse by Supplier if distribution is under the care of Distribution Bucké
inventory.p2: In order to avoid interrupted service, Buvons Local PRO recommends that you always have a minimum inventory level of 2 weeks of expected sales.
inventory.p3: For example, if you sell 20 cases of a particular product over a week, then you should have an inventory level of at least 40 cases.
inventory.p4: For smaller operations or lack of performance, it is forbidden to park product in our warehouse that is not moving constantly. Buvons Local PRO and subsidiary Distribution Bucké, reserve the right to invoice for storage at the additional rate of $5 (five Canadian dollars) per case per month. Customized fees can take place when and if necessary.  Distrubution Bucké will examine case by case accordingly.
inventory.p6: It is advice to control your sales to keep a fair level of inventory at store. Buvons Local PRO recommends that you always have a minimum inventory level of 1 week of expected sales.
inventory.p7: For example, if you sell 5 cases of a particular product over a week, then you should have an inventory level of at least 5 cases.
inventory.p8: It is advised to pay special attention to holiday and special events to avoid running out of product, affecting your sales.

community.p1: Retailers doing business with Suppliers associated with BUVONS LOCAL PRO or DISTRIBUTION BUCKÉ.
community.p2: Buvons local PRO and sister company Distribution Bucké, are proud to support and service an exclusive community of Suppliers and Retailers in the Province of Quebec.
community.p3: With over 3000 distributions points and hundreds of Suppliers. Buvons Local PRO can guarantee that if you are dealing with our official distributor DISTRIBUTION BUCKÉ, you can expect a high level of customer service.
community.p4: As Buvons Local PRO valued customer you can expect the following:
community.p5: Flexibility, when unexpected circumstances or special events arise
community.p6: Your products delivered always on time and in good condition
community.p7: Happy and friendly faces delivering your products at every time
community.p8: One on one personalized attention if any unexpected circumstances shall occur
community.p9: Knowledgeable and ready to assist Staff
community.p10: Pick up of empty containers with each delivery
community.p13: A team ready to go far and beyond for your company
community.p14: Professional management team with years in business
community.p15: Top-notch technology to ensure your business is never late

newsletter.p1: Keep up-to-date on news and promotions
newsletter.p3: Please confirm that you are over the age of 18.
newsletter.p4: Yes, I am over the age of 18.
newsletter.p6: Buvons Local PRO will use the information you provide on this form to be in touch with you and to provide updates and marketing.
newsletter.p7: I agree to receive electronic messages from Buvons Local PRO containing information and offers with respect to products that may be of interest to me, including notification of sales, special events and third-party promotions. I may withdraw this consent at any time by selecting the unsubscribe option.
